jobDescription: Company DescriptionBrainrider is a marketing services company with teams in San Francisco, Menlo Park, and Toronto helping our clients build beautiful, effective, compelling content and campaigns.We are a team of craftspeople. Our expertise and understanding earn our clients trust. We are successful when our clients value us. We hold ourselves accountable. We are driven to become better. We do our best when we work as a team.We work in an open-concept space designed for team collaboration, filled with creativity, productivity, experimentation, and learning. Whether were brainstorming better marketing ideas for our clients or pushing hard to meet a tight deadline, it all happens with teamwork, adaptability, and optimism.Job DescriptionThis is a full-time position reporting to our Menlo Park office. Please apply only if you're in the SF Bay Area. NO RELOCATION OFFERED.Brainrider is looking for a seasoned, results-oriented senior creative project manager to join our client-embedded on-site team, working closely with an in-house creative and content development team at one of the world's most well-known tech companies. You understand how to complete a project without having a perfect picture, let your instincts lead the way, and embrace your process-driven approach to finding the path to successful delivery.
